comments.body:
We should be including the license file like so. However, that will require PR ( https://github.com/tritemio/pybroom/pull/4 ) to be merged and used to generate a release. Let's hold on that until we are confident we can get this to build right.

``` yaml
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
```
Alright things seem to be building. Could we please do something about this license file?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +33,37 @@about:
  home: http://pybroom.readthedocs.io/
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: 'Broom for python: convert fit results to tidy pandas.DataFrame.'

comments.body: No need to template `name`, but if you are rolling out a bunch of personal packages like this I could see the value.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +9,13 @@source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://github.com/tritemio/{{ name }}/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}
